# The Midnight Coder's Children - LLM Context File

> A propulsive, emotionally grounded thriller about trust, legacy, and the fragile bonds that hold both families and civilizations together.

## About This Site

This is the official website for "The Midnight Coder's Children," an upcoming thriller novel by Prashant Sridharan. The book is scheduled for release on September 22, 2026.

## Book Synopsis

When a fast-moving cyberattack spreads across the global financial system, a brilliant systems engineer is pulled into a race against time. "The Midnight Coder's Children" is a thriller that explores the intersection of technology, family, and the invisible threads that connect our modern world.

The story follows an immigrant family navigating the tensions between legacy and innovation, trust and betrayal, as a cascading crisis threatens to unravel everything they have built.
